metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9382 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreeType before 2.6.1 has a buffer over-read in skip_comment in psaux/psobjs.c because ps_parser_skip_PS_token is mishandled in an FT_New_Memory_Face operation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9382` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.6.1-0.1
libfreetype6 - 2.6.1-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-0.1').
